author: todd
msg: Resolved some semantic conflicts in TestFileAppendRestart - we now log more OP_ADDs in the HA branch than we did in trunk.
Resolved some conflicts around removal of VersionedProtocol, etc.

author: rgodfrey
msg: QPID-3605 : renamed method, corrected brace style for ifs, added tests (per Robbies review comments)

author: atm
msg: HDFS-2979. Balancer should use logical uri for creating failover proxy with HA enabled. Contributed by Aaron T. Myers.

author: aconway
msg: QPID-3603: HA support for stand-alone replication.
- New management method HaBroker.replicate to enable replication.
- qpid-ha tool can enable replication of queues.
- qpid-config tool can create queues with replication enabled.
